title: Explaining Elisha and The She Bears to Joe Rogan and Douglas Murray
description:
Joe Rogan makes fun of Biblical stories in episode 1084 of his podcast.  I try to clarify the meaning of this story. 

Podcast: https://youtu.be/rBp4afbDeLk

Clip discussed here: https://youtu.be/UBGvGxrfUMk

Linen and Wool video mentioned: https://youtu.be/bDDDS3Q2XxU

Adam and Eve and Batman video: https://youtu.be/L0-XU8ZMb_Y


My links:  
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld/
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
